    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_93047</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_93047</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electric current</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrischer Strom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courant électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corrente elétrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corrente elettrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικό ρεύμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corriente eléctrica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an electric circuit consisting of a cell, a light bulb and wire,  through which an electric current flows.  Electric currents are electric charges in motion.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen elektrischen 
Stromkreis, der aus einer Zelle, einer Glühlampe und Leitung besteht,
durch die ein elektrischer Strom fließt. Elektrische Ströme 
sind elektrische Ladungen in der Bewegung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un circuit électrique 
se composant d'une cellule, d'une ampoule et du fil, par lesquels un 
courant électrique passe. Les courants électriques sont les 
frais électriques dans le mouvement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um circuito elétrico 
que consiste em uma pilha, em um bulbo claro e no fio, através de que
uma corrente elétrica flui. As correntes elétricas são cargas
elétricas no movimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un circuito elettrico
che consiste di una cellula, di una lampadina e del legare, per cui 
una corrente elettrica passa. Le correnti elettriche sono 
cariche elettriche nel movimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ηλεκτρικό κύκλωμα που 
αποτελείται από ένα κύτταρο, έναν ελαφρύ βολβό και ένα 
καλώδιο, μέσω των οποίων ηλεκτρικές παρούσες ροές. Τα 
ηλεκτρικά ρεύματα είναι ηλεκτρικές δαπάνες στην κίνηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un circuito eléctrico 
que consiste en una célula, una bombilla y el alambre, a través de 
los cuales una corriente eléctrica fluye. Las corrientes 
eléctricas son cargas eléctricas en el movimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stromkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">frais électriques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corrente elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
